function: Collect 10 souls to summon Chojuro.

function: Collect 10 souls to summon 6P-Madara.
name: 6P-Madara (Soul)

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Toneri.

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Young Orochimaru.
name: Young Orochimaru (souls)
desc: Orochimaru during the 2nd Ninja war. Young Orochimaru is a middle-row hero， specialising in many ninjutsu with strong functionality.

function: Collect 10 souls to summon 6P Naruto.
name: 6P Naruto (Souls)
desc: Naruto's new mode after obtaining all Tailed Beasts and a half of power from Hagoromo.;In this mode

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Sage Minato.
name: Sage Minato (Soul)
desc: Minato's ultimate form. He's able to seal enemies' ninjutsu through Shinigami's power.

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Rinnegan Sasuke.
name: Rinnegan Sasuke (Soul)
desc: Perfect fusion of Tailed Beast and Susanoo power. Rinnegan Sasuke is a backrow ninja

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Asura.
name: Ashura(Soul)
desc: Ashura is the second son of the Sage of the Six Paths, inheriting the Sage's teachings. Ashura is a front-row ninja who can effectively withstand damage and possesses healing abilities.

function: Collect 10 soukls to summon Shukaku Gaara
name: Shukaku Gaara (Souls)
desc: Gaara's ultimate form， with high DEF. Shukaku Gaara is a backrow ninja with both offensive and supportive abilities.

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Indra
name: Indra (Souls)
desc: The eldest son of the Sage of the Six Paths, born with the Rinnegan. Indra is a backrow ninja with formidable chakra damage, but he is not skilled in supporting teammates.

function: Collect 10 souls to summon Byakugo Sakura.
name: Byakugo Sakura (Souls)
desc: One of Konoha's new sannin， Sakura's ultimate form during her battle against Kaguya. Possesses extremely powerful healing abilities.

desc: One of the Hachimon Tonkō Taijutsu. Opening each gate allows the user to surpass their own physical limits.

desc: High speed whirl attack.

function: Collect 10 shards to combine Insect Gathering

function: Collect 10 shards to combine Rinnegan
name: Rinnegan (Shard)

function: Collect 10 shards to combine Katon - Gōkakyū

function: Collect 10 shards to combine Suiton - Water Clone
name: Suiton - Water Clone (Shard)
